Meet Me Upstairs

Hours: Tuesday to Saturday 12 PM to 6 PM and by appointment.

We will be closed this weekend for Easter and through the week for install.

We look forward to welcoming you back on April 14th.

*We are currently in the process of updating our website to be

more accessible and ADA compliant. Please get in touch for

assistance or questions.
